articles.title: HC allows Amazon to oppose FRL-RIL deal - Mint
articles.description: Delhi high court said the  ₹24,713-crore transaction between Future group and Reliance Retail Ventures Ltd did not violate any statutory legal provisions, and both parties were free to seek approval for the deal from regulators
